title: Mstislav Rostropovich: Dvorak Cello Concerto. Saint-Saens Concerto No. 1
brief_description: Recorded at the Henry Wood Hall in London, internationally acclaimed virtuoso cellist, Mstislav Rostropovich, gives an exquisite performance of two classic concertos with the London Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Carlo Maria Giulini. This is a German/UK co-production.
